content:
NAME DESCRIPTION
ESTHESIS_EDGE_MODULES_DEDDIE_ENABLED--set esthesis.edge.modules.deddie.enabled Whether the DEDDIE module is enabled or not.Default: false
ESTHESIS_EDGE_MODULES_DEDDIE_CRON--set esthesis.edge.modules.deddie.cron A Quartz-type cron expression, specifying the frequency in which the DEDDIE module tries to fetch data from the DEDDIE API.Default: 0 0 6 * * ?
ESTHESIS_EDGE_MODULES_DEDDIE_MAX_DEVICES--set esthesis.edge.modules.deddie.maxDevices The total number of DEDDIE devices that can be registered in esthesis EDGE.Default: 1000
ESTHESIS_EDGE_MODULES_DEDDIE_PAST_DAYS_INIT--set esthesis.edge.modules.deddie.pastDaysInit The number of days in the past to fetch data from the DEDDIE API for a newly registered device.Default: 7
QUARKUS_REST_CLIENT_DEDDIE_CLIENT_URL--set quarkus.restClient.DeddieClient.url The URL of the DEDDIE API.Default: https://apps.deddie.gr/mdp/rest
